(\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"EPAM\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") is committed to privacy notice (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“This Privacy Notice”\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"), EPAM acts as \\\"data controller\\\". This means that we are responsible for deciding the purposes for which personal data about you is processed and the means we use to carry out such processing activities. We are providing you with this Privacy Notice to explain our practices regarding the collection, use, and other processing of certain information about you.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The processing of employee personal data by EPAM is subject to Regulation No 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the Protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, the Belgian Data Protection Act of 30 July 2018 (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Wet betreffende de bescherming van natuurlijke personen met betrekking tot de verwerking van persoonsgegevens/Loi relative à la protection des personnes physiques à l'égard des traitements de données à caractère personnel\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") and its implementing decrees, and any other rules governing personal data (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“Data Protection Rules”\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\").\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We may update this notice at any time.  Where we can, we will notify you of substantial changes to this Privacy Notice.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The terms \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“personal
